alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 21 at 8:59PM MDT until March 22 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Curry County, Eastern San Miguel County and Far Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 6 AM MDT Tuesday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 7 AM to 7 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on east to west oriented roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing snow will be possible, creating reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands
